summary:
A silly mod for a more casual yet playful set of ragged trousers. Why have raggedy pants be all punched up above your waist when they can hang off the hip? 
- Male & Female versions available for Favored Soul & UNP/UNPB
descriptionHtml:
Like a pair of athletic sweatpants that hang low this is the new and improved Ragged Trousers...totally subject to personal preference BUT! still perfect for building those new Hearthfire homes because one house isn\'t enough...while getting a tan.

<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>

NOTE: This is not a standalone, the files will override the vanilla ragged trouser mesh when installed. No re-texture, just a simple mesh fit. Male & Female versions now!

*This mod is integrated with the Favored Soul body for males and the UNPB body for females, so, problems likely to occur if you do not have the corresponding mod installed. 

*I should mention that for whatever reason Ragged Trousers and Prisoner Clothes for females are one and the same. I first modified the ragged trouser files and discovered they just point to the prisoner clothes regardless, thus I modified that mesh instead. The game should pull up the mod file for both clothing pieces.

*Files are kept separate to provide the option of choice ;)

*Uploaded v1.1 for males for a slightly better fitting mesh (very minor) and modified vertex weights to help prevent the drawstrings from going wonky.


CREDITS:
Chris57 & Favored Soul\'s male body mesh
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488

Dimon99\'s UNP female body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709

Calyps\' UNP Blessed body mesh
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899

Male char in screenshot is a variant of Urshi\'s companion mod Hot Male Housecarls
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17163

Hair is from ApachiiSkyHair (also included in the Hot Male Housecarls mod)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
author: Av1dPup1l
